text: Hello welcome to the community tax clinic what can I do for you Hi it's my first time filing a tax return in this country and I need some help Could you tell me What month the deadline is All personal tax returns are due in April OK I've only worked part time Do you think I'll have to pay a lot of money I'll have to figure that out I'll need to see your personal income statement and your rent receipts you may get a refund this year A refund that would be fantastic I'll need your spouses paperwork too Oh she didn't work at all last year OK so you want to file jointly right Yes I think so Can you give me a list of your dependents What do you mean by dependence Dependence are people that rely on your financial support they include kids under 19 as well as older children who are still students you can also count other family members such as grandparents if you're taking care of them Well it's just my wife Our two children great I'll make a note of that So there are two ways to file taxes we can send a hardcopy by regular mail or we can file electronically which way is faster E-files are usually quick quicker are you ready to begin Yes let's get started
